# glasgow_xaringan_light

The goal of this package is to provide a light themed template for creating slides using the University of Glasgow logo and colors.

## Installation

The package is not on CRAN and can be installed from github.

A stable version can be installed from [GitHub](https://github.com/) 

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("svd09/glasgow_xaringan_light")
```
The **WIKI** page provides users with some initial information to get started.

[Template demo slides can be seen here](https://svd09.github.io/lighttheme_demo/)
